page.title: 09Brewery Site Development
page.content: The Brewery Site was once used for making beer and then as a warehouse. Now Hillreeds are building houses there.The types are called Ashurst, Kemsing,Linton,Pembury,Smarden and Teston.The Ashurst is a 4 bedroomed detached house.The Kemsing is a 2 bedroomed detached bungalow.The Pembury is a 2 bedroomed semi_detached house.The Smarden is a 3 bedroomed detached house.The Teston is a 2 or 3 bedroomed detached house.The Linton is a 4 bedroomed detached house.Hillreeds make all different houses so it doesn't look boring.Altogether the total units on the site are 118.The Brewery itself is being made into 43 homes.The stables have been bought privately to be converted into three,2 bedroomed homes, and the offices are being made into a 4 bedroomed home.The houses cost from Â£30,000 to Â£80,000.
